hero.title: IT Support Specialist
hero.description: Passionate about solving technical problems and improving IT systems. Specialist in maintenance, user support, and network administration.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am Younes Sakr, an IT professional passionate about technology, specializing in technical support, computer maintenance, and network administration. My background combines solid technical knowledge with complementary management training.
about.objective: My goal is to contribute to the optimization of IT systems while ensuring a smooth and secure user experience. I am committed to efficiently solving technical problems and continuously improving IT infrastructures.

exp5.title: Internship - IT Service
responsibilities: Installation and updating of IT equipment (computers and software)
